titles.title: A resolution designating April 23, 2009, as "National Adopt A Library Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
4/23/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates April 23, 2009, as National Adopt A Library Day.
Honors organizations that help facilitate donations to schools and libraries.
Urges all people in the United States who own unused books to donate them to local libraries.
